name: Azumah Nelson
biography: Azumah Nelson is a Ghanaian former professional boxer who competed from 1979 to 2008. He is considered one of the greatest African boxers of all time. Nelson held the WBC featherweight title from 1984 to 1987 and the WBC super featherweight title twice between 1988 and 1997. Known for his exceptional skill and toughness, Nelson earned the nickname 'The Professor.'

name: Dick Tiger
biography: Dick Tiger, born Richard Ihetu, was a Nigerian professional boxer who competed from 1952 to 1970. He was a two-weight world champion, holding the undisputed middleweight title and the light heavyweight title. Tiger was known for his toughness, ring intelligence, and ability to adapt his style to outsmart opponents.
